name: conversation-sync
description: Conversation syncing tool for google sheets, kepla and airtables

scripts.deploy:backendReport: gcloud functions deploy backendReportProcess --max-instances=1 --trigger-resource BackendReport --memory 256MB --runtime nodejs10 --project climate-conversations-sync --region asia-northeast1 --trigger-event google.pubsub.topic.publish && gcloud functions deploy backendReport --memory 256MB --runtime nodejs10 --project climate-conversations-sync --region asia-northeast1 --trigger-http && gcloud functions deploy backendReportRetry --memory 256MB --runtime nodejs10 --project climate-conversations-sync --region asia-northeast1 --trigger-http
scripts.deploy:donationSpreadsheet: gcloud functions deploy donationSpreadsheetProcess --max-instances=1 --trigger-resource DonationSpreadsheet --memory 256MB --runtime nodejs10 --project climate-conversations-sync --region asia-northeast1 --trigger-event google.pubsub.topic.publish && gcloud functions deploy donationSpreadsheet --memory 256MB --runtime nodejs10 --project climate-conversations-sync --region asia-northeast1 --trigger-http && gcloud functions deploy donationSpreadsheetRetry --memory 256MB --runtime nodejs10 --project climate-conversations-sync --region asia-northeast1 --trigger-http
scripts.deploy:donorFacilMatch: gcloud functions deploy donorFacilMatchProcess --trigger-resource DonorFacilMatch --memory 256MB --runtime nodejs10 --project climate-conversations-sync --region asia-northeast1 --trigger-event google.pubsub.topic.publish && gcloud functions deploy donorFacilMatch --memory 256MB --runtime nodejs10 --project climate-conversations-sync --region asia-northeast1 --trigger-http && gcloud functions deploy donorFacilMatchRetry --memory 256MB --runtime nodejs10 --project climate-conversations-sync --region asia-northeast1 --trigger-http
scripts.deploy:mailchimp: gcloud functions deploy mailchimpProcess --trigger-resource Mailchimp --memory 256MB --runtime nodejs10 --project climate-conversations-sync --region asia-northeast1 --trigger-event google.pubsub.topic.publish && gcloud functions deploy mailchimp --memory 256MB --runtime nodejs10 --project climate-conversations-sync --region asia-northeast1 --trigger-http && gcloud functions deploy mailchimpRetry --memory 256MB --runtime nodejs10 --project climate-conversations-sync --region asia-northeast1 --trigger-http
scripts.deploy:raiselyPeople: gcloud functions deploy raiselyPeople --memory 256MB --runtime nodejs10 --project climate-conversations-sync --region asia-northeast1 --trigger-http && gcloud functions deploy raiselyPeopleRetry --memory 256MB --runtime nodejs10 --project climate-conversations-sync --region asia-northeast1 --trigger-http && gcloud functions deploy raiselyPeopleProcess --trigger-resource RaiselyPeople --memory 256MB --runtime nodejs10 --project climate-conversations-sync --region asia-northeast1 --trigger-event google.pubsub.topic.publish
scripts.deploy:saveDonationPhotos: gcloud functions deploy saveDonationPhotosProcess --trigger-resource SaveDonationPhotos --memory 256MB --runtime nodejs10 --project climate-conversations-sync --region asia-northeast1 --trigger-event google.pubsub.topic.publish && gcloud functions deploy saveDonationPhotos --memory 256MB --runtime nodejs10 --project climate-conversations-sync --region asia-northeast1 --trigger-http && gcloud functions deploy saveDonationPhotosRetry --memory 256MB --runtime nodejs10 --project climate-conversations-sync --region asia-northeast1 --trigger-http
scripts.deploy:savePhoto: gcloud functions deploy savePhotoProcess --trigger-resource SavePhoto --memory 256MB --runtime nodejs10 --project climate-conversations-sync --region asia-northeast1 --trigger-event google.pubsub.topic.publish && gcloud functions deploy savePhoto --memory 256MB --runtime nodejs10 --project climate-conversations-sync --region asia-northeast1 --trigger-http && gcloud functions deploy savePhotoRetry --memory 256MB --runtime nodejs10 --project climate-conversations-sync --region asia-northeast1 --trigger-http

author: Raisely <engineering@raisely.com> (https://github.com/raisely)
